message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds significant value for you.  It's a unique asset that aligns perfectly with your business needs and goals.  I'm confident it will be a substantial asset to your organization.  While I understand this is a significant investment, I am willing to offer it to you for $1000000.  This is a price that reflects its true value and allows for a substantial return on your investment.  Please let me know your decision.  If this isn't the right fit for you, I have another interested buyer who is eager to acquire this asset at the same price.  I look forward to hearing from you soon.
